ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And they are guided by the stars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: As well as many other signs, as by the stars (you) find direction.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and He has set other landmarks in the earth. And by the stars too do people find their way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The stars and other signs also help people to find their way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And landmarks; and they are guided by the star.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And (by the) landmarks; and by the stars, they guide themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And landmarks; and by the stars they find the right way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and waymarks; and by the stars they are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And landmarks (too), and by the star they find a way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and He has set up other landmarks. By these and by the stars people set their course.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And also landmarks; and by the stars they are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —and the landmarks [as well]—and by the stars they are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And marks and sign-posts; and by the stars (men) guide themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And landmarks (signposts, etc. during the day) and by the stars (during the night), they (mankind) guide themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And waymarks; and by the star they are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And landmarks. And by the stars they guide themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And landmarks. And by the stars they are [also] guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:16] — and landmarks [as well], by which you might find the roads, [landmarks] such as mountains, during the day, and by the star, meaning, by the stars, they are guided, to the roads and to the direction of prayer (qibla) by night.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And landmarks (too)) mountains and other things for travellers, (and by the star) and by the sun, the moon and the North Star (they) the travellers (find a way) by means of them when travelling on land and in the sea.
